Shop fashion and browse recipes, the kind way. ğŸ¥°

VEEGS offers cruelty-free ğŸŒ±fashion and recipe suggestions - all while you browse online.

Shop your favorite stores and find alternative brands who make similar products by using alternative materials to leathers, cashmere and other cruel animal products. All of the recommended brands use sustainable, plant-based materials only and are completely vegan friendly. 

VEEGS also allows you to browse recipes from top food bloggers and chefs who will provide you with plant-based alternative recipe suggestions. 

* Discover amazing vegan fashion while browsing the web. VEEGS will show you similar products that are cruelty-free and vegan.
* Get plant-based recipe suggestions while browsing leading recipe websites, and learn how to cook cruelty-free delicious meals.  
* Whilst using the VEEGS extension, you can search and browse direct from a large collection of high quality and beautiful products and recipes from the world's top vegan brands.
* Sign up, create a profile and join the VEEGS community to keep up-to-date with new brands, products and innovative functionalities.

Fashion suggestions from top brands, such as:

* ENDA
* SUSI
* Savannah Morrow The Label
* Moo Shoes
* Save The Duck
* Doshi
* Groceries Apparel
* Vegan Scene
* Hemp Tailor
...and more!
